post.summary: Add or update a sysmon configuration

requestBody.description: Sysmon configuration file. Raw XML file that you would use to configure Sysmon can be posted here.

get.summary: Get information about a single endpoint

parameters.name: newkey
parameters.description: Generate a new key for endpoint

requestBody.description: Fields to modify. NB: Not all the fields can be modified

get.summary: Retrieve the content of an artifact
Get the result of a command executed on endpoint

parameters.name: wait
parameters.description: Wait command to end before responding, making the call blocking

post.summary: Send a command to be executed by the endpoint

requestBody.description:
Command to be executed. One can also specify files 
				to drop from the manager to the endpoint prior to command execution 
				and files to fetch after execution. A timeout for the can also 
				be specified, if zero there will be no timeout.

get.summary: Retrieve only a field of the command structure

parameters.name: wait
parameters.description: Wait command to end before responding, making the call blocking

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Field of the Command structure to return

parameters.name: last
parameters.description: Return last logs from duration (ex: '1d' for last day)

parameters.name: delta
parameters.description: Delta duration used to pivot (ex: '5m' to get logs 5min around pivot)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of reports to return

get.summary: Retrieve any kind of logs (detections + filtered)

parameters.name: last
parameters.description: Return last logs from duration (ex: '1d' for last day)

parameters.name: delta
parameters.description: Delta duration used to pivot (ex: '5m' to get logs 5min around pivot)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of reports to return

get.summary: Retrieve report for a single endpoint

delete.summary: Delete and archive a report for a single endpoint

parameters.name: last
parameters.description: Return last reports from duration (ex: '1d' for last day)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of reports to return

tags: IoC Management (control IoCs pushed on Endpoints)
get.summary:
Query IoCs loaded on manager and currently pushed to endpoints.
				Query parameters can be used to restrict the search. Search criteria are
				ORed together.

parameters.name: guuid
parameters.description:
Filter by group uuid
					(used to group IoCs, from the same event for example)

tags: IoC Management (control IoCs pushed on Endpoints)
post.summary: Add IoCs to be pushed on endpoints for detection

tags: IoC Management (control IoCs pushed on Endpoints)
delete.summary:
Delete IoCs from manager, modulo a synchronization delay, endpoints should 
			stop using those for detection. Query parameters can be used to select IoCs to delete.
			Deletion criteria are ANDed together.

parameters.name: guuid
parameters.description:
Filter by group uuid
					(used to group IoCs, from the same event for example)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Regex matching the names of the rules to retrieve

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Show only filters (rules used to filter-in logs)

requestBody.description: Rule to add to the manager

parameters.name: name
parameters.description:
Name of the rule to delete. To avoid mistakes, this
				parameter cannot be a regex.

put.summary: Create a new user with identifier

post.summary: Create a new user from POSTdata

requestBody.description: Data to create the user with. Fields uuid and key if empty will be generated.

parameters.name: newkey
parameters.description: Generate a new random key for user

delete.summary: Delete an existing admin API user
